name: A Plate To Remember
description:
Welcome traveller, Do your taste buds feel like taking a... little risk? Description

In A Plate to Remember next sushi you eat might be your last.

The game features two gamemodes:

  • 1 Player mode - the player and AI eat till the last sushi
  • 2 Player mode - two players have a quick snack instead

Each player takes a turn to either:

  • roll the dice which decides their next action

    • OR

  • Spin the plate and eat one piece of sushi
Game Rules
  • There are 4 outcomes when rolling the dice
    • Eat a piece of sushi
    • Spin the plate and eat a piece of sushi
    • Place one new piece of sushi on the plate
    • Apply one of the 4 possible liquids onto a piece of sushi
  • Liquids
    • Deadly Poison

      • After eating a sushi containing even a drop of this tasty substance, you die. Try to avoid it at any cost

    • Poison

      • You should avoid it just like its predecessor, it kills you after your next turn. Find an antidote as quick as possible.

    • Slow Poison

      • Its not as dangerous as its younger more dangerous brothers, but you still should find an antidote. It kills you after you finish your 3rd turn since you ate a piece that contained it.

    • Antidote

      • The antidote is your savior. After you eat a piece containing it you are free from any poison effects that were applied to you.

Additional information
  • To exit the game press alt+f4
